Package CAMs

Class CAMs

java.lang.Object
CAMs.CAMs
public class CAMs extends Object
Centralized hub for all staff and students.
Since:
2023-11-25
Version:
3.0
Author:
Jeevika, Mathangi, Teja, Vikaas

      public static Scanner input
      Static Scanner object for reading input from the standard input (System.in).

      public static CAMs.InputErrorChecking inputErrorChecking
      Static instance used to perform validation and error checking on user inputs.

    • userFound

      public static boolean userFound
      Boolean value to check if a user is found, password is matched and to logout

    • passwordMatch

      public static boolean passwordMatch
      Boolean value to check if a user is found, password is matched and to logout

      public static boolean logout
      Boolean value to check if a user is found, password is matched and to logout

      Integer representing a user's choice.

      public static boolean isCampCommitteeMember
      Boolean value to check if camp committee member.

      public static boolean enteringFirstTime
      Boolean value for first time users.

      public static CAMs.CampCommitteeMember comMem
      Static reference to a Camp Committee Member associated with the Camp

    • allCamps

      public static List<CAMs.Camp> allCamps
      A static list that contains instances of the Camp class. It is used to store all Camp objects and you can add, remove, or access Camp objects from this list.
      See Also:
      • Camp
      • ArrayList

    • store

      public static List<CAMs.Camp> store
      A static list of Camp objects used to store instances of the Camp class. It is initialized as an empty ArrayList.

    • users

      public static List<CAMs.User> users
      A static list of User objects used to store instances of the User class. It is initialized as an empty ArrayList.

    • campDataManager

      public static CAMs.CampDataManager campDataManager
      A static instance of CampDataManager class for managing Camp objects. It provides methods to perform operations on Camp objects, such as adding, removing, updating, and retrieving Camp information.
      See Also:
      • CampDataManager

    • userDataManager

      public static CAMs.UserDataManager userDataManager
      A static list of Camp objects used to store instances of the Camp class. It is initialized as an empty ArrayList.

  • Constructor Details

    • CAMs

      public CAMs()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws FileNotFoundException
      The main entry point of the NTU CAMs application. It presents a menu for users to log in or exit, and handles corresponding actions based on user input. The application continues to run until the user chooses to exit.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments (not used in this application).
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If there is an issue with reading user data from files.

    • login

      public static void login(List<CAMs.User> users)
      Logs in user and initiates the user interface based on their role (Student or Staff). Upon successful login, the user is presented with a menu corresponding to their user type, and the appropriate actions are taken based on the user's choices.
      Parameters:
      users - A list of User objects representing potential login candidates.

    • declareCommitteeMember

      public static CAMs.CampCommitteeMember declareCommitteeMember(CAMs.Student student)
      Creates a new CampCommitteeMember object based on the provided Student information.
      Parameters:
      student - The Student object from which to create a CampCommitteeMember.
      Returns:
      A CampCommitteeMember object initialized with the student's name, email, faculty, registered camps, student enquiries, and withdrawn camps.

    • campCommitteeMenu

      public static void campCommitteeMenu(CAMs.Student student)
      Displays a menu for the camp committee, allowing them to perform various actions related to a given student.
      Parameters:
      student - The Student object for which the camp committee actions are performed. This student is the subject of the committee's actions.

    • CampSettings

      public static void CampSettings(CAMs.Staff staff)
      Displays a menu using info provided by a staff member where a camp can be created, edited or deleted
      Parameters:
      staff - The Staff member whose information is used to configure camp settings.

    • createCamp

      public static void createCamp(CAMs.Staff staff)
      Creates a new Camp object with the specified staff and adds it to the storage.
      Parameters:
      staff - The Staff object representing the staff assigned to the camp.

    • deleteCamp

      public static void deleteCamp(CAMs.Staff staff)
      Deletes a Camp object associated with a specified staff.
      Parameters:
      staff - The Staff object representing the staff assigned to the camp.

    • editCamp

      public static void editCamp(CAMs.Staff staff)
      Allows a staff member to edit the details of a camp they have created.
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff member initiating the camp editing.

    • registerForCamps

      public static boolean registerForCamps(CAMs.User user)
      Allows user to register for camps by checking the user's type and delegates the registration process to the appropriate user type-specific method
      Parameters:
      user - The User object for whom camp registration should be performed.
      Returns:
      `true` if the registration is successful; otherwise, `false`.

    • submitEnquiry

      public static void submitEnquiry(CAMs.Student student, CAMs.Camp selectedCamp)
      Allows student to submit enquiry for a selected camp
      Parameters:
      student - The student submitting the inquiry.
      selectedCamp - The camp for which the inquiry is being submitted.

    • submitSuggestion

      public static void submitSuggestion(CAMs.CampCommitteeMember comMem, CAMs.Camp selectedCamp)
      Allows camp committee member to submit suggestion for a selected camp
      Parameters:
      comMem - The camp committee member submitting the suggestion.
      selectedCamp - The camp for which the suggestion is being submitted.
